Posts.Content: Apr 20, 2015 05:58PM kmeyers wrote: I am 50 was diagnosed March 19, 2015 had mastectomy done on right side April 7, 2015. Waiting for two more test results to come back before we decide on treatment and or surgery to remove left breast and left ovary.
Posts.Title: Would you mind sharing your age at time of diagnosis? ByFaith Gussy
